name: faraday plate armor
description: A suit of Gothic plate armor, complete with gloves, gauntlets, and a barbute helmet.  It has been conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.

name: faraday chainmail armor
description: A fully customized chainmail suit.  The coif, shirt, arms, and leggings have been modified with leather straps to deal with uneven weight distribution and to allow them to be used separately.  It has been combined with a set of armored boots and gauntlets and conductively interconnected, protecting against electricity.
